Meaning: How suitable a track is for dancing, based on tempo, rhythm stability, etc.
Intensity and activity of a track. High energy sounds fast, loud, and noisy.
Estimated musical key (pitch center) of the song.
Major or minor scale mode of the song.
Measure of spoken words in the track.
Predicts if track contains no vocals.
Detects presence of an audience or live recording.
Musical positiveness conveyed by the track.
Estimated beats per minute (BPM) of the track.
Duration of the track in milliseconds.
